title: Sign in after upgrade and get error null is not an object
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: If delete group chat in the attached dataset on 0.9.12 and upgrade it to 0.9.13 release or to the develop build then on sign in there is ```Error `null is not an object (evaluating ‘cljs.core.deref(statu_im.data_store.realm.core.account_realm).path’) ``` and user can't use app anymore. If restart app and try to sign in then same error is shown.

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
user can sign in after the upgrade
#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
#### On release build 70: 
Error `null is not an object (evaluating ‘cljs.core.deref(statu_im.data_store.realm.core.account_realm).path’) on attempt to sign in. If close it then nothing happens, Sign in screen is shown, if try to sign in again then same error is shown


####  On nightly build: error 1 is shown if close it then error 2 is shown and can't sign in 
error 1: 
``` 00:07 I/ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: object must be of type 'object', got (undefined)
00:07 I/ReactNativeJS:

```

### Reproduction
TF for nightly build (00:08): https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/7575159/sessions/45/?accessToken=22Gcnu9tJIHJyOS68k36GeDqKDw
- Download attached genymotion vm and import this ova file (via DropBox) https://drive.google.com/open?id=11Iq5WfVHQT19uHISsT9hUJJcRbx1n0yo
- Run Vm
- Open Status (it's 0.9.12 version), password: bolcom
- Delete group chat “iOS chat”
- Close Status app
- Install release 0.9.13 build or install develop build on top of 0.9.12
- Run status app
- Sign in



### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: 
- upgrade from 0.9.12 to release build 70
- upgrade from 0.9.12 to nightly build from January 26
* Operating System: Android
not applicable anymore (in 0.9.17 release user can't upgrade and need to create new account)

On 0.9.18: user upgrade app, recovers account and can't login. Reported in Instabug https://dashboard.instabug.com/applications/status-6b2838c6-8064-445d-ae12-3c35e96f3a69/beta/bugs/58 ``` (User Steps) 16-05 06:22:52.372 Shake in: UIAlertController (User Steps) 16-05 06:22:50.704 Top View: UIAlertController (Console Logs) 16-05 06:22:50.653 Instabug - REACT LOG: 2018-05-16 17:22:50.654 [info][tid:com.facebook.react.JavaScript] PRETTY PRINTED EXCEPTION *** NAME: "TypeError" MESSAGE: null is not an object (evaluating 'cljs.core.deref(status_im.data_store.realm.core.account_realm).path') change_account@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/66B3F1E9-2CCA-47B2-B045-3D2381334E65/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:12:5983467 change_account@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/66B3F1E9-2CCA-47B2-B045-3D2381334E65/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:12:6590541 /var/containers/Bundle/Application/66B3F1E9-2CCA-47B2-B045-3D2381334E65/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:12:6592397 G__43690_43697@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/66B3F1E9-2CCA-47B2-B045-3D2381334E65/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:12:6592907 /var/containers/Bundle/Application/66B3F1E9-2CCA-47B2-B045-3D2381334E65/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:12:3940017 invoke_interceptor_fn@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/66B3F1E9-2CCA-47B2-B045-3D2381334E65/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:12:3887407 invoke_interceptors@/v ... Login | Instabug
@annadanchenko I think it might be fixed in some recent version by @cammellos
could not reproduce on recent builds
